verses.text: \w When|strong="H1696"\w* Ephraim \f + \fr 13:1 \ft That is, the northern kingdom of Israel; also in verse 12\f* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w*, there \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w trembling|strong="H7578"\w*; \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w exalted|strong="H5375"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w But|strong="H1696"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* incurred guilt \w through|strong="H1696"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w When|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w had|strong="H7646"\w* \w pasture|strong="H4830"\w*, \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w became|strong="H7311"\w* \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*; \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w were|strong="H5921"\w* \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*, \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w became|strong="H7311"\w* \w proud|strong="H7311"\w*, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* result \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w forgot|strong="H7911"\w* \w Me|strong="H5921"\w*.

Death and Resurrection (1 Corinthians 15:50–58)

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* against \w Me|strong="H3588"\w*— against \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w helper|strong="H5828"\w*.

Where \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w now|strong="H5414"\w* \f + \fr 13:10 \ft Or Shall I be your King now\f* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* whom \w you|strong="H5414"\w* said, “\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*”?

Judgment on Samaria

\w Although|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* flourishes \w among|strong="H6500"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* brothers, \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w*— \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w rising|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*. \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w fountain|strong="H4726"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* fail, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w spring|strong="H4599"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* run \w dry|strong="H2717"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w plunder|strong="H8154"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* treasury \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w precious|strong="H2532"\w* \w article|strong="H3627"\w*.
Samaria will bear her guilt because she has rebelled against her God. They will fall by the sword; their little ones will be dashed to pieces, and their pregnant women ripped open.
